marklogic.body: It's hard for the average person that has Always trusted the media to believe that they are all on the worng side.Â Actually, if this were really still America, we would have FCC void their licenses as they (most all ) have violated their oath by being extremely and openly biased.Â People are like sheep, easily led by the sly and cunning deceivers onn both sides of the aisle. You are correct, media, DemonRatsÂ and Republicans have made Ron Paul out to be a nut case because they fear anyone that will upset their GODD OL'BOY network! Â Â Â Â How many will ever vote for a black man now after this side show?Â I supported cain but almost everyone universally said the saem thing, "I'll never make that mistake again"!Â And that because of the way Obama has both played the race card and proven himslef to be an outright, undeniable RACIST himslef!
